website_summaries.verdict: Lovely 100% unprocessed  Brazilian body wave virgin hair that feels nice to the touch.
pros: Color looks natural, and closure is full and nice
You may get a lot of compliments about how great it looks
Comes nicely packaged in three individualized packs
Even after dyeing, still looks good
No shedding, good quality, and priced just right
cons: Some batches may seem rough, and may have weird smell when removed from packaging
Could mat easily after a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Went to beach and got hair wet and it had a terrible smell and the curls did not come back
customer_reviews.text: This hair was purchase for vacation. It is not 100% human hair. Went to beach and got hair wet and it had a terrible smell and the curls did not come back. Even after shampooing the hair smell was still there. I will NOT purchase this hair again. I Had to take it out while on vacation . Money wasted!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, especially for price
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, especially for price . No shedding , I have also dyed hair and it's still in great condition .
customer_reviews.author: jnoa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a Fave
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this hair was going to be great but even before the first wash, I was noticing some problems. Compared to other hair this one sheds an ungodly amount, just running my fingers through it guarantees hair coming out with my hand. This problem is only made worse by the fact that it tangles easily. Although it lasted for its intended purpose, after a week the price really started to show.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Green

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true but it's truly the best!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the kind of buyers who usually post comments but this for hair i had to...if you're like me..looking at reviews before buying..don't hesitate..buy this hair...the best hair I've ever bought online for the cheapest price...the bundles are thick..the quality is yummy..I just installed it and I'm speechless! Will definitely reorder more. Thanks Vtaozi!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Closure
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Where do I start? Great product for the Price. So happy the closure is the same texture. I feel my bundles may not be the whole 14inches but that’s no Biggie. I will most definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This hair is good for the price. I had it cut and styled into a Bob. I've had it in for about a week and haven't experienced shedding (yet). The closure knots will need to be dyed to match your scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Sayeed M

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this hair two times. It hardly ever sheds and does not tangle. I lightened mine and the texture stayed the same, but the curl pattern changed. It is soft and easy to deal with. If I curl it tightly, the curls will last for theee days. Holds heat well. Looks and feels completely natural.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels nice. Came packaged in individual packs according to size
customer_reviews.text: Hair feels nice. Came packaged in individual packs according to size. Can't wait to bleach and color hair before install.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Knox

customer_reviews.title: Must wash out the scent!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. It was for her sweet 16! No shedding and very soft lasted a long time reused it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: BCM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase, will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy soft, amazing quality, great value. This hair was so good my stylist is going to order a few packs herself. She was amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Bundles
customer_reviews.text: Shared a lot but it was really soft nice looked really beautiful
customer_reviews.author: de'von

customer_reviews.title: Look natural... excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, you can dye this hair and everything. Doesn't get frizzy and looks natural
customer_reviews.author: SPK SR.

customer_reviews.title: Best hair at first; Then Sheds
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the packaging it had a slight smell but once washed it went away. I let it air dry and the pattern came back. This hair is amazing. Very minimal shedding maybe a couple strands nothing major. It’s takes heat and curls very well, (which I loved). I will be ordering this hair again. UPDATE!!! I have had this hair for a month now and it is shedding when I run my fingers through it so my only option is to wear it in a ponytail or take it out. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset I got my hair my closure is like 6in it’s supposed to be 10in and even next to the 10in bundle there is a big difference... The actual bundles are ok.
customer_reviews.author: DAndrea

customer_reviews.title: ... received my package today and I'm more than a happy satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I received my package today and I'm more than a happy satisfied customer. I love the hair it's nice and full and I will definitely become a regular customer for VTAOZI. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Esmitha Lauriston

customer_reviews.title: Good hair😍
customer_reviews.text: Hair had a little smell But it was so soft and luscious Bundles were full Light shedding Overall it’s very good hair
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, hair is soft and packaged well. Will buy from again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair. Very soft and lace closure was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got my order a day early
customer_reviews.text: The hair had no smell, the hair came in all correct lengths, the hair kept its curl pattern after washing. Customer service was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Harriett Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Had this hair in for a month and loved it. I received many compliments. Went to the beach, got it wet and it still was beautiful. I Would recommend this hair to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: smitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The hair is great. I was able to wash, condition, dye and cut! Hair is soft and lasting wear with proper maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful than I expected
customer_reviews.text: More beautiful than I expected. Hair shiny and soft. Closure was perfect. Good quality of hair. I have used it twice already.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Soft, easy to curl.. they will drop. But a nice hang.. looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks like your real hair depending on how u get it done
customer_reviews.text: So I bout a 10 12 and 14 it was too long for me I thought i could rock something short so I cut it as u can see in the picture but it's an amazing hair I shower with it etc I definitely recomemnd the hair
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: The weave felt soft & natural 😀
customer_reviews.text: Rocked the weave for my wedding last Saturday. Loved everything about it 🙌. I must say it was fixed & styled by a pro though.
customer_reviews.author: Wangari

customer_reviews.title: This hair is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this hair for my aunt based on the reviews and omg it is beautiful!!! Such a great deal for the quality of hair!!! I will purchase this hair for myself in the near future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Boose

customer_reviews.title: 💯💯💯💯
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that this hair is 💯 I love it and will order again
customer_reviews.author: celestine wilds

customer_reviews.title: not what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it's not what advertized. 3 different bundle lengths all are the same of a 10" :(
customer_reviews.author: kesha pascal

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair!!! The texture is very soft and the price was excellent for the quality. And it was delivered about 3 days before it said it was due.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Skeesangel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wore for 2 months, flexi rods every night, great hair and even better price
customer_reviews.author: D.RG

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Hair is amazing. I was scared because of the price you know they say "You get what you pay for" this one good though and I love it...
customer_reviews.author: Keith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get tangled, very manageable my hairstylist likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoelvr

customer_reviews.title: So far I love the hair it’s thick and full
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the hair it’s thick and full, kind of a weird smell but other than that I love it and will order more stuff from this vendor😊
customer_reviews.author: Shadaee chase

customer_reviews.title: Bundles short in length
customer_reviews.text: These bundles are very short!!! Quality is decent, sheds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: trav

customer_reviews.title: Loved the quality of this hair and the price even ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality of this hair and the price even more!! I definitely will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hair that I received is soft and pretty. I received my hair in the amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair that I received is soft and pretty. I received my hair in the amount of time that I was actually given. So far it’s been holding up quite well these past couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Tkeya Hicks

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hair Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair...full bundles, no smell, and arrived quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: CaKimme

customer_reviews.title: Good hair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair on Prime for 39.99. I received the hair in 2 Days. It’s pretty good hair for price. I would typically spend $40 on pack hair from my local beauty supply and wear that hair a week, no longer than two. With this hair made a full wig including the closure. I have installed it three times now. So it’s definitely saving me some money. The hair sheds a little bit I also cut my wefts so that kinda explains that. Hair tangles a bit in the back but nothing major where it’s annoying. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase!! $40 for 3 bundles and a closure I can’t really complain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the BEST hair BUT it’s GOOD for the price
customer_reviews.text: The hair reached at the shopping address by the said time ... this was my first time ordering hair from amazon, my first time with HUMAN hair, I’m not a weave person. I must say even though the hair was of nice, healthy quality it did not keep curls, even when I used rods with mousse and spray, curling iron is complete failure...I did however wear the hair for 2 weeks in different styles I even bleached it in the last few days in my hair.There was minimal shedding but after the first week it shedded a little more. 10” closure, 10,12,14” bundles was the order and I ordered black but instead I got brown.
customer_reviews.author: AriPie

customer_reviews.title: Great hair for great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great hair!!!! Will definitely be making future purchases! Washed and conditioned it before installing and the hair texture did not go away like most I’ve purchased! Nice and full with great quality and quantity!!!!! I used 2.5 bundles, which my head is pretty big (lol) and it looks amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sherisha feggins

customer_reviews.title: Hair is soft and bundles are pretty thick. Only complaint is the 10in bundle is ...
customer_reviews.text: Received hair one time. Hair is soft and bundles are pretty thick. Only complaint is the 10in bundle is only 9in and that's with hair straightened. Have not installed hair yet, will do update once I do.
customer_reviews.author: kyonna

customer_reviews.title: We loved the bundles
customer_reviews.text: We loved the bundles. I was very skeptical at first when I ordered but once I received it I was very impressed. I love the texture and the way it feels. I will give you guys 5 stars all day long. Even the stylist said that put the hair in my daughter's head was very impressed. Her stylist said she's going to be ordering some hair from you guys as well. The end product look phenomenal. We were definitely pleased. Will be recommending you guys. I'm also going to order her something a little bit longer than next time. Thanks so much 😘
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid McNeil

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the hair today and I'm liking it thus far. Didnt have a smell it to like I find with most hair. Came packaged with a mesh weaving cap. I wont be using it due to the fact I'm going to be making a wig from this hair. I ordered and recieved 10, 12, 14 with 10 free part closure. Rating at a 3 because I haven't installed yet. Will do an update tomorrow with the final product.
customer_reviews.author: MillerTyme

customer_reviews.title: So first of all the shipping was amazing got my hair within 2 days and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: So first of all the shipping was amazing got my hair within 2 days and so far the hair is soft to touch no shading, the closure is ok so far it seems too short for 10 inches but as soon as I make this week I’ll update my review
customer_reviews.author: Akeea

customer_reviews.title: It was decent, definitely began to shed after 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: It was decent, definitely began to shed after 5 weeks or so. That’s not the hair Malibu Doll Face has in the picture. Lol I would buy it again though unless I had another option.
customer_reviews.author: TashJae

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t waste your money.. I wish I could get my money back!! I just hated it!! A mess
customer_reviews.author: @ladylanes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair ive washed it twice, straightened it, and it's still soft, minimal shedding will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Anita Minor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to color it and it ruined the hair, I don’t believe it is all human.
customer_reviews.author: ruffinfam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep the wave
customer_reviews.text: This hair is not wavy. I had to curl it. The quality is good though.
customer_reviews.author: Chakakhan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good hair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was some good hair to be purchased off of amazon. The price was good and it holds up great. Not too much shedding. I would definitely buy this again,
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: After I washed the hair it didn't go back in ...
customer_reviews.text: After I washed the hair it didn't go back in the shape that it came out of and the hair shedded alot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not into black or 1B I liked color
customer_reviews.text: I like the hair I still have the wig but this hair didn't take color well as well
customer_reviews.author: Natacher Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The hair is very soft and it can hold a curl. Great Price! I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Fair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the hair, very soft, no tangles, easily managed, can flat iron and curl.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Rivka Louis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally Love the hair, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Real48

customer_reviews.title: Worst hair ever
customer_reviews.text: Way to many split end and it doesn’t take dye well
customer_reviews.author: Tyeisha
